data.Name: May-Lorie Saint Laurent
data.staff_bio: May-Lorie is a member of the research team at the Institute for Community Inclusion at UMass Boston, where she contributes to the Vocational Rehabilitation Research and Training Center (VR-RRTC) and to the Research and Technical Assistance Center (RTAC) projects.
data.staff_ed:
B.A., Biology, Hofstra University
M.P.H., Health Policy and Management, State University of New York at Albany
